vecUnachieved.strDescription: Gold Trophy For Raging Plateaus Quick Race

data.strFullDescription:
[h2]Announcing our next game: Kingmakers[/h2][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/300380/extras/537494473a3c1c77e33acf64f4bb5104.poster.avif?t=1750706430" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/300380/extras/537494473a3c1c77e33acf64f4bb5104.webm?t=1750706430"][/imgvid]
[/p][p]We are thrilled to introduce you to Kingmakers, a solo or co-op action/strategy sandbox game with real-time simulated battles in a war-torn medieval era and a modern hero. Prepare yourselves to build, lead, fight, and change the course of history!
[/p][p]
[/p][p]https://store.steampowered.com/app/2109770/Kingmakers/
[/p][p]
[/p][h2]
ROAD REDEMPTION[/h2][p]
[/p][p]Road Redemption is an action racing game where you lead your motorcycle gang on an epic journey across the country in a brutal driving combat adventure, taking heavy inspiration from series such as Road Rash and Motorstorm.  
[/p][p]
[/p][p]Earn money by completing races, assassinations, robberies, and other challenges in your path.   As you collect loot, you'll upgrade your character, your bike, and your weapons.  
[/p][p]
[/p][p][b]One Life To Live[/b]
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/300380/extras/636fa195691075732a890cf733b524fa.poster.avif?t=1750706430" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/300380/extras/636fa195691075732a890cf733b524fa.webm?t=1750706430"][/imgvid][/p][p]Driving a motorcycle at 100 mph while trying to hit someone with a pipe is dangerous, and death can come quickly.   Fortunately, every time you die, all the experience you've collected can be used to upgrade your character, your bike, and your weapons.  
[/p][p]
[/p][p]In the multiplayer splitscreen, 4 friends can work together to let out some road rage in the coop campaign. 
[/p][p]
[/p][p]
[/p][p][b]A Truly Epic Quest[/b]
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/300380/extras/4acac21b30a8617946023544b7cf6406.poster.avif?t=1750706430" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/300380/extras/4acac21b30a8617946023544b7cf6406.webm?t=1750706430"][/imgvid][/p][p]Road Redemption takes place in a post-apocalyptic world, ruled by a brutal dictator.  Fans of Mad Max will feel right at home here.  
[/p][p]
[/p][p]After years of bloody street warfare, the country's biker gangs have settled into an uneasy truce.  
[/p][p]
[/p][p]This period of peace is interrupted when the leader of the country's richest weapons cartel is assassinated, and a $15,000,000 bounty is put on the mysterious assassin's head.  
[/p][p]
[/p][p]It's up to you and your fellow gang members to chase down the assassin and claim this prize, but you'll have to drive through enemy territory to do so.  Every biker in the country wants a piece of that $15,000,000 bounty, and they won't hesitate to take out those who get in their way.  
[/p][p]
[/p][p][b]Other Features[/b]
[/p][p]
[/p][list][*][p]Tons of brutal weapons.  This is more Twisted Metal or Burnout than it is Mario Kart  
[/p][/*][*][p]4-player splitscreen co-op.
[/p][/*][*][p]2-4 player multimonitor co-op. Every player gets his own screen!
[/p][/*][*][p]Massive, expandable skill tree. Rack in the loot to upgrade your character, your bike, and your weapons.
[/p][/*][*][p]A deep motorcycle fighting system with grabs, kicks, counters, critical strikes, and more.  
[/p][/*][*][p]Full support for both mouse & keyboard and gamepad control configurations.[/p][/*][/list]
data.strSnippet: Road Redemption lets you lead a biker gang on an epic journey across the country in this driving combat road rage adventure. Huge campaign, dozens of weapons, full 4-player co-op splitscreen.
